Obtain dicoese level statistics on a particular topic for any diocese of your choosing

Source: R/coe_diocese_census_stats.R
coe_diocese_census_stats.Rd

Obtain dicoese level statistics on a particular topic for any diocese of your choosing

Usage

coe_diocese_census_stats(ons_id, diocese_numbers, ...)

Arguments

ons_id

The ONS id for the required topic

diocese_numbers

Diocese numbers of required dioceses. If empty (the default) data for all dioceses are returned.

...

Other arguments passed to coe_census_stats()
